definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Such instruments as (are) thermometers and barometers can be found in any physics laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 象温度计和气压计之类的仪器在任何实验室都能找到。

sentences.english: Fixed cistern barometers are used as a standard for checking.
sentences.chinese: 固定槽式气压计可以作为标准件去检验。
气压计在过去4小时变化4毫巴。

sentences.english: What is barometric change in your position?
sentences.chinese: 你船位置处气压计有何变化？

sentences.english: The barometer is a good instrument for measuring air pressure.
sentences.chinese: 气压计是丈量气压的好仪器。

sentences.english: Find someone who knows how tall the building is, and trade him the barometer for the information.
sentences.chinese: 找一个知道楼高的人，用气压计换取信息。

sentences.english: You then count the number of marks, and this will give you the height of the building in barometer units.
sentences.chinese: 数出标记总数，再乘以气压计的单位长度，得出楼高。

sentences.english: Fixed cistern barometers are used as a standard for checking aneroid barometers.
sentences.chinese: 固定槽式气压计可以作为标准件去检验无液气压计。

sentences.english: Fixed cistern barometers are used as a standard for checking aneroid barometers.
sentences.chinese: 固定槽式气压计可以作为标准件去检验无液气压计。

sentences.english: Read and note the barometer every hour, and keep watch to seas and winds all the time.
sentences.chinese: 每小时记录气压计读数，并注意观察海况和风情。

sentences.english: In this method, you take the barometer and begin to walk up the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 在这个方法里，你可以带上气压计走楼梯。

sentences.english: Tire Valve, Wheel Balancing Weights, Digital Tire Gauges, Tire Pressure Monitoring System.
sentences.chinese: 气门嘴，气压计，胎压检测系统。

sentences.english: A barometer is used for measuring atmospheric pressure.
sentences.chinese: 气压计被用来测量大气压力。

sentences.english: The glass is falling; it's going to rain.
sentences.chinese: 气压计正在下降，天要下雨了。

sentences.english: But bad luck on the barometer.
Such instrument as thermometer and barometer can be found in any physics laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 气压计这样的仪器在任何物理实验室中都可以找到。

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3

definition: level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
